attributes.title: god awful

attributes.review: I D͎ownloaded thi͎s app be͎cause d͎o͎n͎o͎l͎d͎ t͎r͎u͎m͎p͎ is the best🙄president. Anyways it took HOURS to download and when it finally downloaded I got on the app and it glitched and I saw an orange clown 🍊🤡 on my screen 📺 he looked really scary but I didn’t want to judge him. All of a sudden I heard tiny footsteps everywhere. I ran to my kitchen to see what it was... I couldn’t believe my eyes 👀 My oranges had turned into tiny orange ninjas! They were EVERYWHERE ! They started crawling all over me i I couldn’t see anything but I grabbed my knife and sliced all the little orange ninjas in half. But it gets worse... in front of me I saw Donold trump he said he wanted to talk... so I told him okay let’s go sit down so we can talk. Little did he know the chair 🪑 he sat on was electric ⚡️😈 but somehow he survived 🙄 his little tiny orange ninjas got mad that I tried killing their leader so they started attacking me AGAIN! I thought I was going to die and I almost did but then I came up with an amazing idea 💡I sliced all the orange ninjas 🍊with my knife and ate them 🥳😈 I was finally safe but I still had one problem... I needed to get rid of donold trump. So I called all my tik tok friends and we all finished him 😡😈 he’s said he was sorry but I didn’t forgive him. All my tik tok friends took turns beating him. It was karma for trying to take tik tok down. Donold trump left in tears. I deleted the app and I’m pretty sure I’m safe now. All I gotta say is DONT DOWNLOAD THE APP 😭stay safe out there kids.
